title: The Shadow Arrives
preview: A mysterious shadow appeared in the alley. No one knew where it came from.

title: Whispers in the Dark
preview: Late at night, whispers echoed from the corners where the shadow lingered.

title: Footsteps Behind
preview: Every time Mark walked home, he heard footsteps behind him.

title: Flicker of Light
preview: A single streetlamp flickered, casting long, dancing shadows.

title: A Door Left Open
preview: The old door creaked open at midnight, and the shadow slipped in.

title: Eyes in the Night
preview: Two glowing eyes watched from the darkness, always just out of reach.

title: The Hidden Path
preview: A hidden path revealed itself only when the moon was high.

title: Silent Companion
preview: No matter where Mark went, the shadow followed.

title: The Return
preview: As dusk fell, the shadow returned, ready to begin its story again.
